nodes.text: The Northern Jundland Wastes was the region of the Jundland Wastes that lay north of the Wound. The Dreviad Wastes, the Deathly Heat, Manister Base, and Camp Karnori were location in the area, and the Suns' Rise Ridge bordered the southern edge of the Wastes.
The Northern Wastes was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011.
